description:
AJKK-12 EMBROIDERED CHIFFON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Chiffon Trouser: Twisted silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Gold

Light up the room like a marigold dream in this quintessential ensemble exuding the sparkling energy of sunshine. The embroidered shirt, a canvas of opulence, captures the essence of our heritage. Beige threads, like sunlit wheat, intertwine with shimmering light gold zari, while delicate sequins catch the light, mimicking the marigold's crown bathed in golden rays. Paired with a contrasting magenta dupatta, a burst of twilight against the sunlit field, this timeless ensemble radiates an energy that rivals a field of gold flowers swaying in the breeze.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on chiffon
Embroidered front side panel right on chiffon
Embroidered front side panel left on chiffon
30" embroidered border for front hemline on chiffon
30" embroidered back with border on chiffon
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered border for front & back chaak on chiffon
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon with 4 side borders
1.5 meter dyed wide width twisted silk for trouser
